snippet: The New York Times’s staff scours the Web for interesting and peculiar items. Wednesday’s selections include a discussion over a statement made by Google in a legal filing that supposedly suggested a draconian view on privacy. Plus, a funny...
abstract: The New York Times’s staff scours the Web for interesting and peculiar items. Wednesday’s selections include a discussion over a statement made by Google in a legal filing that supposedly suggested a draconian view on privacy. Plus, a funny cartoon on people responding to Internet on planes.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Controversy Over Gmail Privacy
